ygData.msgSnippet: 1pp per 4 or 1pp per single firework? Tony Buser                          | http://www.unconundrum.com Ubershadow Leprechaun               |
ygData.messageBody:
1pp per 4 or 1pp per single firework?


Tony Buser | http://www.unconundrum.com
Ubershadow Leprechaun | http://www.juju.org
Level 44 Gnome Rogue | http://tunares.juju.org

[ I am but 'a sinn'r an' I 'ave no shame ]
[ T'filch all tha' glimm'rs, purloin all tha' shimm'rs ]
[ T'nab it an' grab it tha's mah fav'rite game ]


On 15 Dec 2000, Barry Clark wrote:

> 1pp each. I sell them as well. I can make a good 100pp in a few hours
> sux having to go back to SF to get the metal shafts.
> so he stocks up on bags in the bank. goes to Fp for water and gnomish
> spirits.
> he is only lvl 4, so he is twinking rather than leveling. plus the $$ goes
> toward his enchating supplies. which is expensive.
>
> Barry
>
>
>
